text: Stockard Channing (born Susan Williams Antonia Stockard; February 13, 1944) is an American actress. She played Rizzo in Grease and First Lady Abbey Bartlet in the show The West Wing on NBC.Stockard Channing at Biography.com. She has also starred in many movies during her acting career. Channing was born February 13, 1944. Channing won multiple Emmy Awards, a Tony Award and a Drama Desk Award. ==References== Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors
title: Stockard Channing
